org.freezedry.persistence.writers

Class XmlWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.freezedry.persistence.writers.XmlWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PersistenceWriter

    public class XmlWriter
extends java.lang.Object
implements PersistenceWriter
    Writes an the semantic model (starting at the InfoNode root node) to an XML file through the use of the DOM tree.

      • getDisplayTypeInfo

        public boolean getDisplayTypeInfo()
        Returns:
        true if type information is written to the XML file

      • setDisplayTypeInfo

        public void setDisplayTypeInfo(boolean isDisplay)
        Set whether to display type info as an attribute in the XML
        Parameters:
        isDisplay - set to true to have the type info displayed as an attribute

      • write

        public void write(InfoNode rootNode,
         java.io.Writer output)
        Writes the DOM tree to XML
        Specified by:
        write in interface PersistenceWriter
        Parameters:
        rootNode - The root InfoNode of the semantic model
        output - The Writer output stream to which to write the semantic model.
        Throws:
        javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException
